changedPromptTip: The current HoYoverse Account has been changed. Are you sure you want to switch to the new HoYoverse Account's character?
codeToast: A verification code has been sent to the in-game mailbox of the corresponding character. (Verification code valid for 10 minutes)
invalidPromptTip: Login no longer valid. Please login again to switch characters
switchTip: You are currently not logged in, please select a login method
